results.adx_keywords: Electric and Hybrid Vehicles;Automobiles;Driverless and Semiautonomous Vehicles;internal-sub-only;Musk, Elon;Ford Motor Co;Tesla Motors Inc;Twitter
results.title: A 120-Year-Old Company Is Leaving Tesla in the Dust
results.abstract: Boring old Ford is proving to be a very modern company.

results.adx_keywords: Railroad Accidents and Safety;Freight (Cargo);Hazardous and Toxic Substances;Norfolk Southern Corporation;Springfield (Ohio)
results.byline: By Eduardo Medina and Claire Fahy
results.title: A Second Norfolk Southern Train Derails in Ohio
results.abstract: Though no hazardous materials leaked, the crash near Springfield, Ohio, on Saturday renewed questions about rail safety, just over a month after the East Palestine derailment.

results.adx_keywords: Missing Persons;Kopta, Patricia;Pennsylvania;Puerto Rico
results.title: Pennsylvania Woman Who Disappeared in 1992 Is Found Alive in Puerto Rico
results.abstract: The family of Patricia Kopta, now 83, thought she had died years ago. They were stunned to learn that she had been on the island since at least 1999.

media.caption: Patricia Kopta was found after she shared tidbits about her past to employees at a nursing home in Puerto Rico that had been taking care of her for years.

results.adx_keywords: Basketball;Social Media;Firearms;Morant, Ja (1999- );Memphis Grizzlies;National Basketball Assn
results.title: Memphis Grizzlies Guard Ja Morant Steps Away From Team
results.abstract: The Grizzlies said Morant would be away for at least two games but did not say why. Several people posted video clips on social media that appeared to show Morant holding a gun.

media.caption: Memphis Grizzlies guard Ja Morant will miss road games against the Los Angeles Clippers and the Los Angeles Lakers.

results.adx_keywords: Wind Power;Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Rumors and Misinformation;United States Politics and Government;Afghanistan War (2001- );Trump, Donald J;Conservative Political Action Conference;Manhattan (NYC);Afghanistan
results.title: Fact-Checking Trump’s Speech at CPAC
results.abstract: The former president made inaccurate claims about the murder rate in New York, the withdrawal from Afghanistan and windmills at a conservative conference.

media.caption: Former President Donald J. Trump returned to old themes when he spoke at the Conservative Political Action Conference on Saturday night.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Hall, Shamaiya (1997- );Italy (Tex)
results.title: Woman Arrested After Three Children Are Killed in Texas
results.abstract: The killings happened on Friday in Italy, Texas, after a caseworker visited the home and ordered that the children be removed, officials said.

media.caption: Jerry Cozby, a deputy sheriff in Ellis County, Texas, left, at a news conference. Three children were found dead in Italy, Texas, on Friday.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Skin Cancer;Age, Chronological;Presidential Election of 2024;Biden, Joseph R Jr
results.title: Lesion Removed During Biden’s Physical Was Cancerous
results.abstract: President Biden’s physician said that the lesion was basal cell carcinoma, a common and relatively unaggressive form of skin cancer, and that no further treatment was needed.

media.caption: The site of President Biden’s biopsy has “healed nicely,” his doctor said.

results.adx_keywords: Comedy and Humor;Rock, Chris;Smith, Will;Smith, Jada Pinkett;Netflix Inc
results.title: Review: Chris Rock’s ‘Selective Outrage’ Strikes Back
results.abstract: A year after Will Smith slapped him at the Oscars, Rock responded fiercely in a new stand-up special, Netflix’s first experiment in live entertainment.

media.caption: Chris Rock’s new Netflix stand-up special, “Selective Outrage,” was packaged more like a major sporting event, a star-studded warm-up act to the Oscars next week.

results.adx_keywords: Heart;Clinical Trials;Surgery and Surgeons;Medical Devices;Research;your-feed-science;your-feed-health;Abbott Laboratories;American College of Cardiology;Edwards Lifesciences Corporation;New England Journal of Medicine
results.title: New Treatment Could Help Fix the Heart’s ‘Forgotten Valve’
results.abstract: Patients with leaking tricuspid valves in a research trial saw improvements with a procedure that does not require a risky open-heart surgery.

media.caption: A scanning electron micrograph of a section of a human heart showing the tricuspid valve, upper right, seen from the right ventricle. Three to five percent of people over 65 have seriously leaking tricuspids.

results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Fatalities);Power Failures and Blackouts;Rain;Weather;Floods;Tornadoes;Alabama;Arkansas;Kentucky;Mississippi;Southern States (US);Tennessee
results.title: At Least 12 Dead After Storms Sweep the South
results.abstract: Thousands remained without power on Sunday after storms cut a destructive path through the region. The Kentucky governor warned that the power failures could last for days.

media.caption: At least 12 people died after high winds and heavy rains lashed the South on Friday, officials said.
media.copyright: Barbara Gauntt/The Clarion-Ledger, via Associated Press

results.adx_keywords: Snow and Snowstorms;National Parks, Monuments and Seashores;Weather;Roads and Traffic;Rain;Cold and Cold Spells;Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department;California;Los Angeles (Calif)
results.title: Stranded in California’s Heavy Snow
results.abstract: Back-to-back storms left many people stuck as snow piled high. More is still in the forecast.

results.adx_keywords: Academy Awards (Oscars);Comedy and Humor;Rock, Chris;Smith, Jada Pinkett;Smith, Will;Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences;Netflix Inc;Baltimore (Md)
results.title: Chris Rock Mocks Will Smith in Live Netflix Special, Addressing Oscars Slap
results.abstract: Nearly a year after Smith smacked the comedian across the face at the Academy Awards, Rock gave the stunning episode the full stand-up treatment.
org_facet: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences

media.caption: Chris Rock made jokes in a new comedy special that touched on being slapped by Will Smith onstage at last year’s Academy Awards ceremony.

results.adx_keywords: Prisons and Prisoners;Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Amnesties, Commutations and Pardons;Content Type: Personal Profile;Smart, Pamela;Bedford Hills Correctional Facility
results.title: Remember Pamela Smart? ‘To Die For’ Convict Now Seeks Mercy.
results.abstract: The woman who became a national sensation in 1990 after her teenage lover killed her husband has become a prison preacher. She hopes New Hampshire will set her free.

media.caption: Pamela Smart said she has apologized, and that it’s wrong the man who actually pulled the trigger is free and she is not.
media.copyright: Sara Hylton for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Workplace Environment;Tests and Examinations;Psychology and Psychologists;Labor and Jobs;Hiring and Promotion;Human Resources
results.title: The $2 Billion Question of Who You Are at Work
results.abstract: Employers are finding personality tests — measuring how employees think and feel — more useful than ever while navigating hybrid work. But the tests are not always up-to-date.

results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Obituaries);Actors and Actresses;Television;Movies;Pinsent, Gordon;Newfoundland (Canada)
results.title: Gordon Pinsent, Actor Known for Playing Twinkle-Eyed Rogues, Dies at 92
results.abstract: Frustrated in Hollywood but celebrated in Canada, he drew widespread praise late in life for his performance opposite Julie Christie in “Away From Her.”

media.caption: Gordon Pinsent and Julie Christie in the 2006 film “Away From Her.” Mr. Pinsent won wide acclaim for his role as a man whose wife is institutionalized because of Alzheimer’s disease.

results.adx_keywords: Subpoenas;Executive Privilege, Doctrine of;Special Prosecutors (Independent Counsel);Storming of the US Capitol (Jan, 2021);Presidential Election of 2020;United States Politics and Government;Trump, Donald J;Pence, Mike;Justice Department
results.title: Trump Asks Judge to Block Pence’s Testimony to Grand Jury
results.abstract: The former president’s lawyers cited executive privilege, a tactic they have used with other ex-Trump aides.

media.caption: Former Vice President Mike Pence is a key potential witness in the Justice Department’s investigation into former President Donald J. Trump’s attempts to hold on to power.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Kelce, Travis;Ballerini, Kelsea (1993- )
results.title: ‘S.N.L.’ Imagines How ‘Fox & Friends’ Might Cover the Dominion Suit
results.abstract: The cast and writers stepped in to fill the gap in Fox News’s coverage of its own election lies scandal, in an episode hosted by Travis Kelce.

media.caption: From left, Mikey Day, Heidi Gardner and Bowen Yang played the “Fox & Friends” hosts Steve Doocy, Ainsley Earhardt and Brian Kilmeade in the “S.N.L.” opening sketch.

results.adx_keywords: Social Media;Law and Legislation;Politics and Government;International Relations;Mobile Applications;Colleges and Universities;Data-Mining and Database Marketing;Computers and the Internet;Privacy;Biden, Joseph R Jr;Hawley, Josh D (1979- );Trump, Donald J;TikTok (ByteDance);China;Canada;Europe;India;United States
results.byline: By Sapna Maheshwari and Amanda Holpuch
results.title: Why Countries Are Trying to Ban TikTok
results.abstract: Governments have expressed concerns that TikTok, which is owned by the Chinese company ByteDance, may endanger sensitive user data.

media.caption: TikTok has long denied allegations that it puts sensitive user data into the hands of the Chinese government.

results.adx_keywords: Divorce, Separations and Annulments;Conservatism (US Politics);News and News Media;United States Politics and Government;Content Type: Personal Profile;Conway, George T III;Conway, Kellyanne;Trump, Donald J;Fox News Channel
results.title: Former Trump Adviser Kellyanne Conway and George Conway Are Divorcing
results.abstract: The political odd couple had bewildered Washington when Ms. Conway was serving as an adviser to President Donald J. Trump and her husband was one of his fiercest critics.

media.caption: Kellyanne Conway and George T. Conway III, arriving at an event the day before Mr. Trump's inauguration as president in 2017.

results.adx_keywords: Income Inequality;Personal Finances;Customer Loyalty Programs;Credit Cards;Luxury Goods and Services;Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
results.byline: By Chenzi Xu and Jeffrey Reppucci
results.title: The Dirty Little Secret of Credit Card Rewards Programs
results.abstract: When you book a free hotel room using credit card rewards, poor consumers are ultimately footing the bill.
